name: electron-aws-test
description: Test Electron app that calls AWS Lambda through API Gateway

scripts.build:electron: cd my-app && npx tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const dir=path.join(process.cwd(),'dist-electron');fs.mkdirSync(dir,{recursive:true});fs.writeFileSync(path.join(dir,'package.json'), JSON.stringify({type:'commonjs'}));"
scripts.dev: npm run build:electron && concurrently "cd my-app && npm run dev -- --host=127.0.0.1 --port=5174" "cross-env ELECTRON_START_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5174 electron my-app/dist-electron/main.js"
